en: \nb[Sages]\n[1], it's been forever!\. How goes it?
\f[1]\nb[\n[1]]King, Sages, you'd better sit tight. I have a ton of new and exciting stories to tell.
it: \f[1]\nb[\n[1]]Re, saggi, ho tante avventure nuove ed incredibili da raccontarvi!
